hero.title: Shisha Salon Deuxxx
hero.subtitle: Premium Shisha Experience by the Riverside
hero.description: Enjoy a special moment with the highest quality shisha in a comfortable space.

about.title: About Deuxxx
about.description1: Shisha Salon Deuxxx is a shisha specialty store located riverside along the Naka River in Haruyoshi, Chuo Ward, Fukuoka City.
about.description2: Located on the 2nd floor of Hotel The Hakata Terrace, you can relax while enjoying the view of the Naka River and Canal City in a spacious environment with high ceilings. Our shisha offers thick smoke and careful setup by first-class shisha packers, providing quality that satisfies everyone from beginners to advanced users.
about.feature1Description: Enjoy the view of Naka River and Canal City
about.feature2Description: Free Wi-Fi, power outlets, barrier-free access

reservation.title: Reservation
reservation.subtitle: Please feel free to make a reservation. We will provide you with the best shisha experience.
reservation.name: Name
reservation.success: Thank you for your reservation! We will call you for confirmation.

contact.title: Contact
contact.subtitle: Get in Touch
contact.addressDetail: 〒810-0003 2F-E Hotel The Hakata Terrace, 2-4-14 Haruyoshi, Chuo-ku, Fukuoka
contact.access1: About 10 minutes walk from Tenjin-minami Station
contact.access2: About 7 minutes walk from Watanabedori Station
contact.seating: Seating: 24 seats (20 sofa seats, 4 counter seats)
contact.shareCharge: Share charge: ¥800 per person (No table charge)
contact.payment: Payment: Credit cards accepted (VISA, Master, JCB, AMEX, Diners)
contact.reservation: Online reservations available through Tabelog and Hotpepper

menu.title: Menu
notes: ※Customizable according to your taste and smoke preference

footer.accessDetail1: About 10 minutes walk from Tenjin-minami Station

shisha.title: Shisha
shisha.description1: Enjoy a deeply satisfying shisha experience with carefully selected flavors and the highest quality shisha leaves.
shisha.description2: We offer flavors from around the world including Al Fakher, DOZAj, Azure, Afzal, Darkside, and Bonche.

drinks.title: Drinks
drinks.description1: We offer a rich drink menu from fresh juices to authentic non-alcoholic cocktails and premium champagne.
drinks.description2: Experience deeper flavors with drinks carefully crafted to complement shisha.

day.title: Day
day.description1: A refined space created by riverside views overlooking the Naka River and Canal City, combined with sophisticated interior design.
day.description2: Enjoy an open atmosphere filled with natural light during the day, and fantastical lighting-wrapped lounge time at night.

night.title: Night
night.description1: Spend special moments at night with fantastical lighting and luxurious atmosphere.
night.description2: Enjoy relaxation time that continues until late night with premium drinks and shisha combinations.
